title: 只按一下ctrl不用按其它键窗口就会自动缩小
content: 只按一下ctrl不用按其它键窗口就会自动缩小。今天突然这样的，很奇怪。卸载了重新安装了也不行，重启电脑也不行。同样地，缩小后，再按此键与滚轮无法实现放大，它不停地闪，似乎是放大与缩小在做斗争，然而是缩小赢了。弄了一下午也没找到答案。

title: amazon stuck on amazon spanish
content: after looking for a book in spanish on amazon and at the suggestion of the app (on firefox) switched to “amazon en español”, have been unable to go to the english version of amazon. i can do that using other browsers. and it happens both using ios as well as windows 10 thank you
creator: MBTT

title: Firefox does not start
content:
Hello, On my system (windows 10, latest updates installed) the Firefox browser does not start anymore. I uninstalled it and reinstalled the current version without any change. I even can’t access the secure mode as after pushing the button to start it a Firefox-message will only appear for a tenth of a second before disappearing again - I have no chance to read it.

I checked several Mozilla support pages without finding any solution. The other browser (Brave) is running absolutely fine without any problems.
creator: wagner-bernd

title: Firefox browser takes too much time to load
content: Hi, I have a website that is related to medical inventory management services. I am facing an issue on my chrome browser that when I open my website on Firefox browser it takes 2-3 minutes to load, while I open it on chrome browser and it loads within few seconds. I don't know why it happens. I am using the Firefox browser for 2 years and I don't face this type of issue before. Do I need to clear the browser cache? Or need to update the browser as I am running an old version of Firefox. Support help needed, Thanks!
creator: Arec-Johnson

title: remove bing completely
content: for some time I was able to avoid "bing" showing up in win 10 firefox. Now it appears again and i even cannot get rid of it via registry editor.
creator: michaelvi

title: Restore the profile and than no pwd saving avaiable
content: Hi folks, the user deleted his firefox completely. But he had saved his profile folder. So I installed the latest version of firefox and loaded all the content from the saved profile folder into the new profile folder - and he got his old ff back again. But all his pwds where gone - but that's okay, I made a printout of it all. Now he comes back to me with the problem, that none of the pwds enterd new will be stored. I was via teamvier on his pc - and he was right. I enterd a pwd, press the save button, get into the page, quit the page, call the page again - no pwd appeared. I compared all the setup parameter with mine, where everything works fine - there was no difference. So what can I do ? Is it a lockwise problem ? Thanks for any answer Michael
creator: makdiver

title: after saving of a complete website (*.html) and trying to reopen again the saved files I get the message: ' Failed to load the bootstrap JavaScript: VAADIN/vaadinBootstrap.js'
content: After saving of a complete website (*.html) and trying to reopen again the saved files I get the message: ' Failed to load the bootstrap JavaScript: VAADIN/vaadinBootstrap.js' . What to do?

title: [FF 91.0.2] - Only being able to save the PASSWORD of a specific homepage, but not the USERNAME
content:
Hello,

saving login data for diffrent homepages works in general. But there is one homepage, where Firefox is just able to save the password, but not the username. For every login, i have to type in my mail adress (username) manually. The site where this happens is: https://www.ebike-connect.com/login?lang=de-de You can try it on your own. Just create an free account and try to save your login data.

P.S.: I tried saving the login data with the edge browser and it was no problem. It can log me in automatically.

Regards Thomas
creator: steffenthomas

title: Why does Firefox keep opening in a tiny window?
content:
Firefox frequently - but not always - opens in a tiny window - which then has to be stretched to the full-window size it was until closed. Has started with this version: 91.0.2 (64-bit)

Thank you for your help.
creator: sandfordrj

title: Wrong text encoding on Netzero Message Center.
content:
It seems the wrong text encoding is being used to display emails on Netzero Message Center.

Whenever there are characters outside the ASCII range in an email, it displays those characters incorrectly.

There used to be an item in the menus, and a toolbar button, that allowed switching to a specific encoding. If I changed from Western to Unicode, the emails looked right.

Now there's a repair encoding option, that is grayed out and does nothing for me. The emails don't look right.

Whether a switch to hit, or a more lasting fix, what can I do now?
creator: PAGulley

title: Pop-up
content: When I open firefox, firefox open many small windows. The windows have as 'activate' button. They disappear after a few seconds. How do I get rid of them?

creator: ad9

title: HTTPS only in all windows enabled
content:
When I click my Firefox bookmark to a webmail page that is only https, I get the "Secure connection not available" warning. If I refresh the page, the https login page appears. This happens only on the first click after starting Firefox. Thereafter, the https page always comes up. If I quit Firefox completely, restart, and click on the webmail bookmark, I get the warning page. If I once again refresh the page, I am directed to the https login page.

This phenomenon only happens on this particular webpage. Do I have a redirect bug? Malwarebytes and Knock Knock say no.
creator: harleyp1

title: How do I prevent malware apps (like DeskApp) from downloading the Firefox browser on my PC?
content: I know FireFox certainly isn’t malware. It actually has the best security record of any browser in use. I am just hesitate to download Firefox because I want to make sure how I can prevent malware software apps from download the firefox browser on my PC. Is there any guide which can help me? Thanks!

title: Link öffnen
content:
Hallo,

nach dem update vom 28.08.21 kann ich zwar auf usnere Website zugreifen, aber darin enthalte links wie Reisen <Norwegen oder von - bis kann ich nicht mehr öffnen.Als Fehler wird dieser Text angezeigt. </p>

https://www.skandaktiv.de/ bzw. www.skandaktiv-reisen.de

Fehler: Umleitungsfehler

Die aufgerufene Website leitet die Anfrage so um, dass sie nie beendet werden kann. 

   Dieses Problem kann manchmal auftreten, wenn Cookies deaktiviert oder abgelehnt werden.

Ich habe keine Ahnung wo ich was ändern ,muß oder kann???? Ich bin für jeden Tipp dankbar.
creator: synchros

title: forefox acting strange! browser size and position fluctuates
content: I've been using firefox as my default browser since it started, but yesterday it started getting weird. I open the browser and rather than open to the size of my monitor it opened to 1/4 size, next time I opened the browser it opened normally, next time 1/4 size and so on. I've looked at settings and it looks ok (not that I've changed anything recently) When it opens 1/4 size I click the top right to open full size and the 1/4 size browser moves from te left side to the right, the I click the top right full screen and it opens full screen with tools. Really weird! Has there been a screwy update?

title: Double padding in bookmarks menu AGAIN - imposed without thinking!
content:
After the update that changed the bookmarks menu spacing in the most unhelpful way, I have reduced this stupid double padding between the folders with a hack - an now with the current update to 91.0.2 - it is back on!!???

Whose idiotic idea it was without giving us the OPTION of single OR double padding??

Why do we have to look online for the hacks and workarounds to remove this most idiotic and controlling change??

Please bring the single padding back NOW or I will completely switch to Chrome or simply will stop updating firefox!

You will NOT control how many folders and bookmarks I can see in my top menu bookmarks - and this idiotic double padding has removed half of them from my menu!!!
creator: magicpowers888
